casebody.data:
No. —, Original.

Benjamin Gitlow v. People of the State of New York. Submitted November 20, 1922. Decided November 27, 1922. Mr. Joseph R. Brodsky for plaintiff in error. Mr. Samuel A. Berger for defendant in error.

Petition for a writ of error to the Supreme Court of the State of New York, in this cause, submitted to the whole court, granted.
